reviews.review: great game?

One of the best experiences ever made. Yes this is a game but it is more than that in the same way enjoying a movie starts by going out of home. 
Try it, you'll love it. Promise.
holy crap i love this game so much/

O que dizer sobre Portal 2? Jogo DELICIOOOOOOOOOSO  e uma maravilhosa continuação do 1, com umas surpresas e descobertas a mais. Seu modo co-op também é super divertido e COM CERTEZA super recomendo. Se você for uma pessoa muito ousada, pegue todas as conquistas  e mostre o quão bem você domina sobre  gravidade, transferência de matéria e criação de energia. Brinque mesmo! São um bom número de horas que valem a pena cada segundo. Seja paciente e observe bem, não há nada acima de sua capacidade. Definitivamente, 10/10.
Awesome as was the first one :)
Everything that was good in the first Portal, except better. Longer story, more revolutionary game mechanics and better puzzles. Also a sweet co-op mode. 5/5.
The game is fun to play and can really get rid of boredness.

Aperture Science, we do what we must, because we can!
10/10 game of the year

I have pre-ordered the game for 50 euros, and I would still pay this amount of money to buy it again. The campaign is cool, the story takes unexpected turns, and it even tells you the backstory of Chell without even referring to her!
To really get the story, it is also suggested to play the first Portal game and to read the comic, as this gives you the complete experiene. And boy, do I love it!

The gameplay is great, the game deviates from the many CoD and WoW-clones by giving you a gun that fires two linked portals. You will learn to use these portals through the game, and how to fight with it using other elements from the test chambers.

When the campaign is done, don't worry, there still is an unlimited amount of test chambers to complete. Thanks to the Perpetual Testing Initiative (PeTI), players can create and submit their own chambers for other players to test!
If you think you are ready to tackle the responsibilities of making your own chambers and releasing them into the wild, then the PeTI is something you'll love aswel. It's easy to use, and with it you can create stunning chambers from Aperture's glory time.

Are you more into complex chamber designing? Don't worry, the PeTI is mod-friendly, and countless mods have been made to expand the elements to be used in the creator. My favorite mod is Ben and August's Extended Editor, where you get the full access to all Portal and Portal 2 testing elements plus custom made elements that almost all work without the player needing to install mods for themselves.

Or if you are more into 3D design and making a chamber just like the developers did, Valve has made a special entry of Hammer for Portal 2, which is free to download and use when you get Portal 2. It certainly is the most difficult to work with, but it also gives you the most freedom. You can even create outside levels with it!
Otroligt kul att spela med vänner

Do you like puzzles? Do you like to solve them in first-person view? What about shooting dimensional portals that you can go through? How about a wanky Disney-like robotic ball? If you say yes to any of these, then you'll like Portal 2.

I love this game. Not just the unique puzzles with the portals, gels and laser/lights, but also the atmosphere which leads you through out the whole game. The funny and bizzarre humour of GlaDOS, Wheatley and the original owner of the testing lab, the very well designed levels, everything!

Well done!
Melhor jogo da minha vida! E ainda vai me dar uma ensignia!
Is good long time forever.b second ownership. very worth

This is by far my favorite puzzle game of all time. [10/10]

A história é muito boa, empolgante e cheia de reviravoltas. O modo Coop é muito divertido quando jogado com um amigo. Sem dúvida nenhuma o jogo vai trazer uma alegria indescritível ao usar o momentum ou ao trollar um amigo.
Great game, about 8 hours of entertainment.. Some of the time its a bit slow but all together its a great game.

Très très bon jeu ! Pour finir le jeu il vous faudra beaucoup réfléchir ! De plus, grâce à sa longévité de jeu (environ 8h) etaux multiples possibilités qu'offrent l'utilisation de portail le jeu est fortement apréciable ! Portal 2 possède aussi un jeu en coop très intéressant et qui ralonge encore la durée de vie du jeu !
Das Spiel macht aufjedenfall eine Menge Spaß. Wenn man es nie gespielt hat dann aufjedenfall ein muss. Im Coop gibt es noch viele weitere interessante Level.

классная игра!советую=)

“When life gives you lemons, don’t make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don’t want your damn lemons, what the hell am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life’s manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I’m the man who’s gonna burn your house down! With the lemons! I’m gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!”
Nice Story, Nice Graphic. Valve Masterpiece!

Für mich eines der besten Spiele die ich gespielt habe. Viel Witz, knifflige Rätsel und eine gute Atmosphäre treiben das Spiel voran. Die Grafik sieht sehr gut aus und der Sound ist auch hervorragend. Dieses Spiel ist in seinem Genre der absolute Spitzenreiter. Ganz klare Empfehlung!
I hope they make Portal 3 :)

My advice: Find a friend and buy this game together, sit back, and enjoy.  One of the best co-op titles out there.  The actuall game isn't very long, but the community added content that is available is as robust as any game I have ever seen.  This title is a whole lot of fun for a super modest price tag.  Buy it!

Phenomenal story as well as gameplay. You might have to get the first to understand everything, but it's up to you. They were both great games, but this is my absolute favourite. It might even be the best game I have ever played. I've played it through about four times on my xbox. I fully recommend it. 100000000000000000000000000000000000000/10

I played this game right after I beat Portal. I loved Portal, but it didn't make my top 5 list. 

Portal 2 goes one step futher than Portal in terms of storyline. The linear story just seems to suck you in and you just want to keep playing. The test chambers are fun, and challenging. There is also lots of humor throughout the game.

If there is one game you need in your collection, it is Portal 2.

My favorite game of all time. The puzzles are fantastic and so is the story, which just gets better when you read the fextra stoff they don't tell you in the game. And the humor. Oh man, listening to GLaDOS drone on about my imminent death was one of the best parts of the game. The characters are perfectly developed, and the dry, wry humor endlessly entertaining.

ok to start with:

I have bought portal and portal 2 about at the same time. And i couldn't wait to play portal 2 after the first game. It's definetly longer than the 1st one and the graphics are pretty neat. The games plays well and the storyline is well developed. The change and atmosphere fit the game perfectly.
The story itself like is said long. At some point in the game even too long. (not going to say where since i don't want to spoil). But the point is: you need to learn to solve the puzzles with new techniques. I don't really mind, but it's a different way of mindset and thinking.
In the end, the game does what it has to do. Making you hope for portal 3. :)

BEST GAME FUCKING EVER

Having played the first Portal and being disappointed by other game sequels I was a little concerned about this game. All those concerns were erased when I finally played it. The puzzles are fun, though they do seem simple compared to the original Portal, but that may just be because of playing the first Portal. The multiplayer adds a new element to the game for solving puzzles. Definitely worth playing Portal 2 as well as going back and playing Portal.
I like this game.

Une de mes plus belles expériences vidéoludiques. Un jeu d'une intelligence rare. Les énigmes sont ingénieuses et complexes, mais on finit toujours par trouver, avec un sentiment de puissance incroyable. Ce FPS est un must have. Mention spéciale au coopératif qui ajoute une petite touche de fun en plus à un jeu déjà bien sympa. Le bémol viendra naturellement de la durée de vie, mais avec une bonne promo il ne faut pas passer à coté.
Game is awesome, but it's too short.

Why is this game fun? Because of it's simplicity and fun design. Valve did a great job and I will always like the source engine. The game feels more alive and real than any other puzzle I ever played.  I say get it! If you need to play, I will do the coop again...
